class_e_06_battle_01:
Another day, another round of battle study! Osu!
Let’s get right to it![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_02:
I hope you gave Auto Battles a shot like we
talked about last class![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_03:
Making good use of Auto Battles will let you train
up a bunch of different Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_04:
It’s also an efficient way to gather the Pokémon
materials you need to make TMs at TM Machines![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_05:
Speaking of which! Have you all been using the
TM Machines?[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_06: I sure hope so, ’cause it’s pop quiz time![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_07:
To create TMs, you need Pokémon materials and
one other thing. Anyone remember what that is?[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_answer_01:
Looks like you’re already a TM Machine pro,
new kid![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_answer_02:
Whoa! Hold on there, new kid! Offering up HP to
create TMs sounds like some kind of ritual or\r
something! That’s not how it’s done![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_answer_03:
Close, new kid! Close! But don’t think that money
makes every little thing in the world go ’round![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_08:
The correct answer is League Points—or LP
for short![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_09:
You can give LP and Pokémon materials to a TM
Machine to create TMs. But that’s not all!\c
You can also exchange Pokémon materials at a
TM Machine to get LP![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_10:
I recently heard about some shady individuals
getting LP illegally using a technique called...\r
hacking? Or something like that.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_11:
I don’t want any of you getting involved in bad
stuff like that. Got it?![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_12:
Anyway, you can also add TMs that you want to
make to your watch list. This will let you keep an\r
eye on the materials you need to gather![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_14:
In order to make TMs, you need Pokémon
materials![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_15:
And if you want to get hold of lots of materials,
you’ll have to battle all kinds of Pokémon![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_16:
Aw, man! I was just about to suggest we do some
hands-on practice to really drive the point home,\r
but I guess we’re never gonna have the time...[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_06_battle_17: Class is over for now! Take care, you little rascals![VAR 0114(0024)]
